title: Bounty _BOX
author: Bounty _BOX
created_time: May 25, 2023, 02:54:19 AMLast edit: May 25, 2023, 03:24:09 AM by Bounty _BOX
content: WEBSITE -  TELEGRAM  -   DISCORD - TELEGRAM - TWITTER - Presale-ICO Live Bounty campaign will be managed by  Bounty _Box.   $10,000 worth of $BLB   allocated for this Bounty Campaign > The bounty program was launched on 25/05/2023 and will run until 21/06/2023Bounty Winner reward distribution Start After end Campaign  > BoundlessWorld world ICO Now Live :- http://ieo.boundlessworld.org/> Listing on Exchange after end of ICO 1. All participants must join the Boundlessworld Token 's official   Telegram group .2. All participants must join bounty_Box  Telegram group .3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty_box Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BRC-20 Wallet Address: Weekly Report Format:Code::Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …Tweet:1. ...2. ...[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. … Twitter _30%Telegram _25%Discord _25%YouTube _20%WEEK LIST1 WEEK _ 25/05 _ 31/052 WEEK _ 01/06 _ 07/063 WEEK _ 08/06 _ 14/064 WEEK _ 15/06 _ 21/06Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Boundlessworld Token  Twitter page .2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use : $BLB #boundlessworld.org/ #web3 ##Boundlessworld #ICO #Presale #MetaversHow to join:1. Join the BoundlessWorld official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty _Box  Telegram Group.---------- Join Here ---------- Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants have to use ,Boundlessworld, name on telegram account that shouldn’t promote other projects.2. Profile picture shouldn’t promote any other project.3. Write at least 2 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/boundlessworld_group and 3 messages weekly in other crypto related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear Boundlessworld Token avatar and text until the end of the campaign.How to join:1. Join the BoundlessWorld official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty _Box  Telegram Group.---------- Join Here ----------Rewards:- > 2 Stake Every week Rules:- 1. Join the #Boundlessworld official Discord server.2. Write at least 5 constructive messages on Discord server.3. Report your Message link  weekly 4. Deleted messages will not be counted.How to join:1. Join the BoundlessWorld official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty _Box Telegram Group.------------ Join Here ------------Rewards:- High quality: 10 stakesGood quality: 5 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:- ★ Participants must have at least 500+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length & Videos must have at least 250+  views. ★ Each participant can send only 1 video.★ Only original video content will be accepted★ All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication post link , project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, or other social media. ★ Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. ★ Spam or Deleted video will not be counted. How to join:1. Join the BoundlessWorld official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty _Box  Telegram Group.--------- Join Here -------------------- Mastersheet ---------
